commit message: Removed chromecast support from amazon, for now
Hide keyword when moving away from the searchView

Mitigated crash when adding new subscriptions. This was done by updating the dependencies, removing unused code, and not running notifyDataSetChanged() on the main thread. The last thing probably did the trick. https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?can=1&q=77846
Call notifyDataSetChanged instead on notifyItemRemoved due to a bug in RV (see previous commit message
Added null check in the notification player
